alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 12:07PM PST until January 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Los Banos - Dos Palos, Merced - Madera - Mendota, Planada - Le Grand - Snelling, West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties, Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma, Fresno-Clovis, Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5, Delano-Wasco-Shafter, Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore, Visalia - Porterville - Reedley and Southeast San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Interstate 5, Highway 152, Highway 198, Highway 180, Highway 41, and Highway 43.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
